page.title: 10A Station Sergeant's life
page.content: A Sergeant begins work at 2.00 at the police station. He gets to work at 1.45 and takes over from the early turn sergeant,who tells him how many prisoners there are and have they been fed etc.A little old lady comes into the police station with a huge dog on a lead saying she found it straying near her house. The Sergeant takes it from her and puts it in to the police station yard and aranges for a P.C. to take it to the dogs home.Lots of things are reported lost and found,such as spectacles, watches, umbrellas, money etc.Other things a sergeant deals with are people being involved in traffic accidents, disturbances on the street,in restaurants and cafes,public houses and other public places.At 6.00 he has his tea and at 10.00 he goes home. by Nicola Vivienne Baker.
